metadata.title: Luvable Friends Unisex Baby Plush Bathrobe, Blue, 0-9M
features: Soft and gentle on baby's skin
description: Luvable Friends plush bathrobe is made of soft and cozy plush fleece, perfect to let your little one snuggle up in after a warm bath or on a chilly night. Made with comfortable, cozy fabric.
